Package nzilbb.ag.util

Class OrthographyClumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.ag.util.OrthographyClumper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<Graph,​Graph>, UnaryOperator<Graph>, GraphTransformer
    public class OrthographyClumper
extends Object
implements GraphTransformer
    Transformer that joins isolated punctuation (and other non-orthographic) 'words' to the preceding (or following, if first) word.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getClumpForwardPattern()
      Getter for clumpForwardPattern: A regular expression that identifies characters that should be clumped to the following rather than previous word, e.g. opening parentheses.
      String getNonOrthoCharacterPattern()
      Getter for nonOrthoCharacterPattern: A regular expression that identifies a non-orthographic character.
      String getPartitionLayerId()
      Getter for partitionLayerId: ID of a partition layer, such that words can't be clumped across partitions.
      String getWordLayerId()
      Getter for wordLayerId: ID of the layer to transform.

      • getClumpForwardPattern

        public String getClumpForwardPattern()
        Getter for clumpForwardPattern: A regular expression that identifies characters that should be clumped to the following rather than previous word, e.g. opening parentheses. Default value is [({\[<].
        Returns:
        A regular expression that identifies characters that should be clumped to the following rather than previous word, e.g. opening parentheses.
